thread.title: Canadian Exclusive: Indigo to Host Celebrity Chef Jamie Oliver on October 28, 2015
thread.title_full: Canadian Exclusive: Indigo to Host Celebrity Chef Jamie Oliver on October 28, 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Canadian Exclusive: Indigo to Host Celebrity Chef Jamie Oliver on October 28, 2015
text:
Indigo Books & Music Inc.
TORONTO , Oct. 23, 2015 /CNW/ - Indigo (TSX: IDG), Canada's largest book, gift and specialty toy retailer is pleased to host one of the world's best-loved television personalities and one of Britain's most famous exports, celebrity chef Jamie Oliver , at an exclusive event this October.
Jamie will appear at Cineplex Varsity Theatre on October 28, 2015 as he introduces his exciting new Food Network Canada show, Jamie's Super Food . Jamie's Super Food airs Sundays at 11:00 am EST on Food Network Canada. Jamie will also be introducing his brand new cookbook, Everyday Super Food .
Following the exclusive television screening, Liza Fromer , host of The Morning Show , will join Jamie onstage to talk food and share tips on living a healthy lifestyle.
Due to the high-profile nature of this event, this will be a ticketed event. The ticket includes a signed copy of Everyday Super Food . To purchase a ticket please visit Eventbrite . For more information please visit indigo.ca/events .
Follow @indigogreenroom on Twitter for up-to-the-minute updates.
Event Details: Where: Cineplex Varsity Theatre
55 Bloor Street West
Toronto, ON Date: Wednesday October 28, 2015 Time: 12:00 p.m. - 1:30 p.m.
